lead_paragraph: For years, the Kansas City Chiefs’ owner, Lamar Hunt, has been trying to get the N.F.L. to expand the playoff pool. It is not hard to understand why. For the past five seasons, the Chiefs have had one of the league’s most thrilling offenses. But they have had only one playoff appearance — and one loss — to show for it.
